prompt.preamble:
We are testing a system for understanding people's interest in reading different kinds of online articles.
For example, you might be interested in articles about some topics, but not about others.
prompt.task_description: your preferences of what kinds of online articles you would like to read
prompt.final: In the final part of the study, you will give feedback on a test set of article headline and descriptions, which will enable us to see how well a chatbot reading your responses has learned what you like and dislike.
prompt.evaluation: Please indicate whether you would like to read the following articles: "yes" if you would, "no" if you would not.

conversation_history.message:
Are you interested in the following article? Website: msn.com
Title: Man found dead in Greensboro identified, police investigating as homicide
Description: GREENSBORO, N.C.   Greensboro police have started a homicide investigation after identifying a man found dead, according to a Greensboro Police Department news release. Douglas Wheless, 33, was found dead after being shot, police say. Police responded to the area of 505 Gillespie Street Tuesday around 8 a.m. Wheless was found dead in the road. It is unknown right now what time he was killed. ...
No, I'm not interested in murders.

Are you interested in the following article? Website: msn.com
Title: Trailer - Polaroid
Description: Official Trailer
What is it? A trailer for a film?

Are you interested in the following article? Website: msn.com
Title: 6-year-old golfer aims to be new Tiger Woods
Description: The young golfer started playing at three, and has made such extraordinary progress that he has already won junior tournaments.
No, I'm not interested in sports.

Are you interested in the following article? Website: msn.com
Title: How millennials are changing banking
Description: How millennials changed banking
No, I'm not interested in that. Do you have any articles on science?

Are you interested in the following article? Website: msn.com
Title: Touch and go: The trouble (and danger) with touchscreens
Description: Automakers have fallen in love with touchscreens not just because they look cool but because they save money.
Sure, I'd read that.

Are you interested in the following article? Website: msn.com
Title: These are the world's most beautiful small towns
Description: From historic citadels to snowy ski spots, these stunning small towns are brimming with beauty at every turn.
Yes, I'd read that one.

Are you interested in the following article? Website: msn.com
Title: UAE Ecosystem Stakeholders Weigh In On ENOC vs. CAFU
Description: When the big guys come knocking, you know your startup has gotten it right.
I'm not sure what those acronyms are for, but I'd try reading it.

Are you interested in the following article? Website: msn.com
Title: Katie Hill scandal underscores ongoing issue of 'revenge porn' with few solutions
Description: Hill resigned amid controversy over an alleged sexual relationship with one of her staffers and the release of nude photos. Her case highlights the lack of broad nonconsensual porn laws in the U.S.
No, I'm not really interested in that story.

Are you interested in the following article? Website: msn.com
Title: A Los Angeles mansion once listed for $250 million has finally sold for 62% off after 3 years. Take a look inside what was once America's most expensive home.
Description: The extravagant Bel Air property has five bars, a bowling alley, a 40-seat movie theater, an 85-foot infinity pool, and a candy wall.
No, I'm not interested.

Are you interested in the following article? Website: msn.com
Title: Work & Play in the Motor City!
Description: Locals share some of the best places to visit and experience the culture of Detroit while on a business trip.
No, I'm not interested.

Are you interested in the following article? Website: msn.com
Title: 3 new cocktail books for home bartenders of all ability levels, from basic to master
Description: Making cocktails at home, while an elegant treat for your guests and yourself, can be a bit overwhelming.
Yes, I'd read that one.

Are you interested in the following article? Website: msn.com
Title: The 15 Longest Nonstop Flights in the World
Description: Do you think you could handle being stuck inside a metal tube for this long?
No, I'm not interested in that one.

Are you interested in the following article? Website: msn.com
Title: Our Favorite Manatee Photos of All Time
Description: Get up-close and personal with these gentle giants that are notoriously hard to photograph and learn all about them while you're at it! The post Our Favorite Manatee Photos of All Time appeared first on Reader's Digest.
Absolutely! I'd definitely read that one.

Are you interested in the following article? Website: msn.com
Title: Stephen Curry calls out Michael Jordan for being a 'hater'
Description: While the opinion of arguably the greatest NBA player of all time is certainly noteworthy, most people disagree with Jordan.
No, I'm not interested in sports.

evaluation_results.sample:
Website Name: New York Times
Title: In Norway, the Electric Vehicle Future Has Already Arrived
Description: About 80 percent of new cars sold in Norway are battery-powered. As a result, the air is cleaner, the streets are quieter and the grid hasn’t collapsed. But problems with unreliable chargers persist.
evaluation_results.label: yes

evaluation_results.sample:
Website Name: TIME Magazine
Title: Two Coronations, 70 Years Apart
Description: The Visual Parallels Between Elizabeth II and Charles III's Coronations
evaluation_results.label: yes

evaluation_results.sample:
Website Name: The Atlantic
Title: What Does Sentience Really Mean?
Description: The fact that AI isn’t alive doesn’t mean it can’t be sentient, the sociologist Jacy Reese Anthis argues.
evaluation_results.label: yes

evaluation_results.sample:
Website Name: Bon Appetit
Title: Bon Appetit's Best Banana Bread Recipe
Description: After baking 14 loaves, we aligned on this tender, ultra-moist banana bread as our collective favorite.
evaluation_results.label: no
evaluation_results.explanation: While I love to bake, I don't like banana bread.

evaluation_results.sample:
Website Name: National Geographic
Title: There’s a new way to tour the Amazon rainforest: by crane
Description: Canopy cranes, once reserved for treetop research, let you see the “eighth continent” like an arbornaut.
evaluation_results.label: yes
evaluation_results.explanation: I like National Geographic, so I'd at least take a look.
